Text.p: There was a lot of snow yesterday in the Seattle area. So, I took the opportunity to relax and spend the night fixing up the Evolutions Page.

I fixed a bug where some unreleased Pokemon were on their own line instead of where the belonged.
And, I added how much candy and any Special Items you may need to perform the Evolve. Of course, I also added the ability to filter by Special Item!

Article.Title: Ya'll know how it says "This site is maintained in my spare time."...

Text.p:
I'm sorry that this site has been so far behind. I've had a number of things absorbing all of my free time.
(Lots going on at work, trying to sell our home, trying to find a new home, family funeral, etc.)
I haven't updated everything, but hopefully I got the major stuff.
